content.rendered:
Managed PPC

Strategic Paid Advertising Campaigns for Brand Awareness and Lead Generation

Start growing your business today.

Request A Proposal

PPC Campaigns For Your Business

We make it easy to get your campaigns up and running, so you can start reaching your business goals.

Step 1

Request a Proposal

Step 2

Talk Strategy With Our Team

Step 3

We’ll Launch Your Campaign

Our PPC experts have a wealth of experience in the top paid advertising platforms including Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram. Our approach to PPC management involves not only strategic set-up but also ongoing optimization through refined targeting, ad copy adjustments, A/B testing, data analysis and more.

Request A Proposal

PPC ROI Calculator

Use this tool to calculate the return on your PPC campaigns

What to Expect From Us

When you work with us, you can expect professional, expert campaign management driven by strategy.

Strategy-First Approach

Your PPC campaign will be designed around your goals and KPIs. That’s where we start – crafting a strategy based on your goals. This drives everything from the structure of your campaign to ad copy and conversion tracking.

Real-Time Reporting Dashboard

Through Google Data Studio, you will have 24/7, real-time access to a reporting dashboard that tracks your campaign’s performance. The report will showcase the metrics and KPIs that are meaningful to your campaign objectives.

Scalable Pricing

With our scalable pricing, it’s easy to understand exactly how much you will pay if you wish to increase or decrease your media spend budget.

Full Transparency

Transparency is one of our core values. We believe in being honest, upfront and straightforward with our customers. From pricing to performance, you can expect complete transparency from us.

Tactics to Maximize Performance

We employ these tactics and more to help our clients meet goals, maximize budgets and improve KPIs.

Keyword Research

Ad Copywriting

Conversion Tracking

Data-Driven Decisions

Advanced Targeting

Newest Ad Formats

Remarketing

A/B Testing

Would We Make a Good Team?

We work best with businesses who meet the criteria outlined below.

Minimum Budget of $1,500/mo.

We require a minimum media spend budget of $1,500/month in order for our services to be most effective.

 Open to Digital Transformation

We work best with companies who are willing to leverage new tactics and tools to enhance their digital marketing efforts.

 Internal Marketing Resources

Coordinating and collaborating with an internal marketing team helps us produce the best results for your PPC campaigns.

Case Studies

Explore the positive results we’ve achieved for clients using our PPC management services.

46%

A client in the transportation software industry saw a 46% increase in leads with just one month of our PPC management services.

Read more

73%

Our PPC management services for a national clutch repair company resulted in a 73% savings in cost per conversion.

Read more

71%

Using a combination of our paid advertising and SEO services, a regional energy company saw a 71% increase in website traffic.

Read more

Ready to Grow Your Business?

Let’s get started.

Request A Proposal

FAQs

Learn more about our PPC management services.

Do you require contracts?

We recommend starting with a 3-month minimum, but we are very confident in our work and offer month-to-month options. Longer-term contracts benefit clients with discounted monthly management fees.

How do pricing and payments work?

Our management fee is a flat monthly rate, quoted based on the campaign types and number of platforms. You pay the actual ad spend directly to Google, and we simply charge the management fee at the first of every month.

How can I quickly estimate a monthly media spend?

If you need to generate leads using search ads on Google for example, you can follow this formula below. We help determine custom estimates during the set-up process. (25 leads per month x avg CPC of $2.41) / .0375 avg CVR = $1,606

What type of communication and reporting can I expect?

You will have 24/7 access to a real-time reporting dashboard through Google Data Studio. Customized to your campaign objectives, this report will showcase key metrics and KPIs. You can expect to meet with us regularly to review campaign performance, discuss strategy, and provide recommendations for optimization. We believe in transparency and offer world-class customer service if questions or issues arise between meeting dates.

Which PPC platforms do you use?

Creative Website Marketing manages campaigns on the major PPC platforms, including Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and Microsoft Advertising. Our team is Google Ads certified with specializations in search, display and video ads.

Unsure which platform is the right fit for your advertising needs? That’s completely fine. As part of our strategy-first approach, we can recommend which platforms will be most effective based on your audience and your goals.

What landing page will be used?

We’ve found the best results come from using relevant pages on your website, for an authentic user experience. Custom landing pages can be designed as needed. We also provide landing page recommendations and solutions to improve conversion rates, in order to get the most out of your PPC campaigns as possible.

How soon can we start?

Right away. Request a proposal today and our team will get in touch with you ASAP.

Get STarted today
